name: task
createString: CREATE DATABASE `task` /*!40100 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 */

tables.name: black
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `black` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'IP地址',
  `machine_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '机器码',
  `user_agent` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '访问时的user_agent',
  `channel` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `black_channel_index` (`channel`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_machine_id` (`machine_id`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='小黑屋'

tables.name: channel_task
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `channel_task` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `file_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `channel` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `desc` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务描述信息',
  `content` mediumtext NOT NULL COMMENT '任务脚本',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_task_name` (`desc`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='各个机房渠道的脚本信息表'

tables.name: code
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `code` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `ip` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '请求者IP',
  `src` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道来源',
  `machine_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备号',
  `tick_count` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '系统TickCount，用于识别是否重复请求',
  `code` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备码',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_code` (`code`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_machine_id` (`machine_id`),
  KEY `idx_src` (`src`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='软件启动码'

tables.name: config
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `config` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '服务器IP',
  `client_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '该IP的浏览器数量(数量会在浏览器更新逐渐更新到该值，不过如果为0，那么立即生效)',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_client_count` (`client_count`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='挂机服务器的特殊配置'

tables.name: ip
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `ip` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `channel` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称',
  `ip` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'IP地址',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_ch` (`channel`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='使用过的IP信息'

tables.name: ip_info
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `ip_info` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'IP地址',
  `user_agent` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '浏览器UA',
  `width` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1920 COMMENT '浏览器分辨率',
  `height` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1080 COMMENT '浏览器分辨率',
  `cookie` mediumtext DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'cookie信息',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='IP对应的浏览器详情'

tables.name: ip_test
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `ip_test` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `ip` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'IP地址',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='IP测试表（记录一下使用过的IP）'

tables.name: keys
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `keys` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `keyword` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关键字',
  `times` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '出现次数（权重）',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_keyword` (`keyword`),
  KEY `idx_times` (`times`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='浏览器关键字'

tables.name: result
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `result` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `hour_time` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务时间，仅仅精确到小时',
  `channel` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称',
  `task_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务名称',
  `result` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '任务结果',
  `times` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '该状态出现的次数',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `count_task_name_hour_time_result_pk` (`task_name`,`channel`,`hour_time`,`result`),
  KEY `idx_fail` (`times`),
  KEY `idx_hour_time` (`hour_time`),
  KEY `idx_success` (`result`),
  KEY `idx_task_ch` (`channel`),
  KEY `idx_task_name` (`task_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='统计信息表'

tables.name: sn
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `sn` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '请求者IP',
  `src` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道来源',
  `machine_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备号',
  `code` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户码',
  `task_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务名称',
  `user_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平台用户名',
  `sn` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户的sn',
  `used` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `cookie` mediumtext DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户cookie',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_sn` (`sn`),
  KEY `idx_code` (`code`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_machine_id` (`machine_id`),
  KEY `idx_src` (`src`),
  KEY `idx_task_name` (`task_name`),
  KEY `idx_user_name` (`user_name`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户sn'

tables.name: task
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `task` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `channel` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '任务名称',
  `content` mediumtext NOT NULL COMMENT '任务脚本',
  `platform_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '平台Id：0.爱奇艺 1.优酷 ',
  `watch_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '该影片需要观看的时长',
  `movie_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '影片唯一Id',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `idx_task_name` (`name`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`),
  KEY `task_movie_id_index` (`movie_id`),
  KEY `task_platform_id_index` (`platform_id`),
  KEY `task_watch_time_index` (`watch_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='脚本信息表'

tables.name: user_agents
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `user_agents` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `content` varchar(180) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'user-agent字段',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_content` (`content`),
  KEY `idx_time` (`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='当前可用的UA列表'

name: xq
createString: CREATE DATABASE `xq` /*!40100 DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 */

tables.name: cloud
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `cloud` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '首次创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '更新时间',
  `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `role_id` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '在用户表中的Id',
  `state` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '0.停止状态 1.正在工作',
  `user_info` varchar(5000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户登录信息',
  `config_info` varchar(5000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户配置',
  `sub_info` mediumblob DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '压缩之后的用户属臣库',
  `user_info_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '用户信息上传的时间',
  `user_info_err` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户信息失效的原因',
  `work_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '2020-01-01 00:00:00' COMMENT '该用户被工作节点接管的时间',
  `work_ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '当前工作所在的IP地址',
  `logs` varchar(5000) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '最近日志信息',
  `update_timestamp` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `cloud_platform_role_id_uindex` (`platform`,`role_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `cloud_update_timestamp_uindex` (`update_timestamp`),
  KEY `cloud_create_time_index` (`create_time`),
  KEY `cloud_platform_role_id_state_index` (`platform`,`role_id`,`state`),
  KEY `cloud_state_work_time_index` (`state`,`work_time`),
  KEY `cloud_work_time_index` (`work_time`),
  KEY `idx_state` (`state`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='云'

tables.name: cmd
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `cmd` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `code` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备码',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `name` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '最近一次命令的名称',
  `tk` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '命令上传携带的时间戳',
  `act_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT 'code, name, count相同的命令出现的次数',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_code` (`code`,`name`,`tk`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户命令表'

tables.name: code
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `code` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '最近一次访问时间',
  `ip` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '请求者IP',
  `machine_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备号',
  `tick_count` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '系统TickCount，用于识别是否重复请求',
  `code` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '设备码',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_code` (`code`),
  KEY `idx_ip` (`ip`),
  KEY `idx_machine_id` (`machine_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='软件启动码'

tables.name: player
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `player` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称，为空表示是微信小程序',
  `partition_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '大区',
  `uid` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '玩家的用户Id',
  `level` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '玩家等级',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_uid` (`platform`,`uid`),
  KEY `idx_level` (`level`),
  KEY `player_channel_partition_id_index` (`platform`,`partition_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='玩家信息总表'

tables.name: price
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `price` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `product_id` varchar(40) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品Id',
  `money` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '价格（人民币）：分',
  `money_inner` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '内部价格（人民币）：分',
  `vip_time` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT 'VIP时间：天',
  `product_info` varchar(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品描述',
  `max_day_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '每天的限购数量',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_product_id` (`product_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='商品价格表'

tables.name: sn
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `sn` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `sn` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '注册码',
  `wx_user_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建者在wx_user表中的Id',
  `record_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '在wx_record表中的Id号',
  `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '渠道名称，为空表示微信渠道',
  `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '使用者的游戏角色Id，如果为0表示还没有被使用过',
  `total_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '该注册码包含的VIP时间：天',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `use_time` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '使用时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_sn` (`sn`),
  KEY `idx_record_id` (`record_id`),
  KEY `idx_role_id` (`platform`,`role_id`),
  KEY `idx_wx_user_id` (`wx_user_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='注册码'

tables.name: user
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `user` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '最近一次访问时间',
  `code` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '最近一次访问的设备码',
  `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平台名称，默认为微信',
  `role_id` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户在平台的roleId',
  `uid` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户在平台的userId',
  `server_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户所在的区',
  `partition_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户所在的大区',
  `user_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '微信授权的用户名称',
  `nick` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户游戏昵称',
  `vip_level` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户的vip等级 0.免费用户 1.付费用户 2.超级付费用户 3.内部用户',
  `tower_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '今天已经爬塔的次数',
  `tower_date` date NOT NULL COMMENT '爬塔计数的日期',
  `chest_count` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '今天已经挖矿的次数',
  `chest_date` date NOT NULL COMMENT '挖矿计数的日期',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `user_platform_role_id_uindex` (`platform`,`role_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户信息表'

tables.name: vip
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `vip` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `platform` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '平台名称，默认为微信',
  `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户的游戏角色Id',
  `vip_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() ON UPDATE current_timestamp() COMMENT '用户的VIP截止时间',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `vip_platform_role_id_uindex` (`platform`,`role_id`),
  KEY `idx_vip_time` (`vip_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='用户的VIP信息表'

tables.name: wx_record
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `wx_record` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '首次创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '更新时间',
  `channel` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户下单时候的渠道名称',
  `record_id` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '订单号',
  `product_id` varchar(40) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品Id',
  `total_time` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '该注册码包含的VIP时间：秒',
  `price` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品价格',
  `count` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '商品数量',
  `state` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '订单状态： 0.待支付 1.已支付',
  `wx_user_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户在wx_user表中的Id',
  `bank_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '付款银行',
  `wx_transaction_id` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '微信支付订单号',
  `time_end` varchar(14) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '支付完成时间：格式为yyyyMMddHHmmss',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_record_id` (`record_id`),
  KEY `idx_state` (`state`),
  KEY `idx_wx_user_id` (`wx_user_id`),
  KEY `wx_record_create_time_index` (`create_time`),
  KEY `wx_record_price_index` (`price`),
  KEY `wx_record_product_id_state_price_create_time_index` (`product_id`,`state`,`price`,`create_time`),
  KEY `wx_record_wx_user_id_product_id_state_create_time_index` (`wx_user_id`,`product_id`,`state`,`create_time`),
  KEY `wx_record_wx_user_id_state_create_time_index` (`wx_user_id`,`state`,`create_time`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='微信支付订单表'

tables.name: wx_user
tables.createString:
CREATE TABLE `wx_user` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `token` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_type` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '用户类型 0.普通用户 1.系统管理员',
  `channel` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '每个用户的唯一渠道名称',
  `nick` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '昵称',
  `open_id` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT 'openId',
  `avatar` varchar(2000) NOT NULL COMMENT '头像',
  `create_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '首次创建时间',
  `update_time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT current_timestamp() COMMENT '更新时间',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_open_id` (`open_id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `idx_token` (`token`),
  UNIQUE KEY `wx_user_channel_uindex` (`channel`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='微信用户表'
